</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 34 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Bola](/Weapons.aspx?ID=123)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Clockwork mechanisms tick away inside the weights of these _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [bolas](/Weapons.aspx?ID=123)_, spooling out more cord in midair.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** The cord of the bola snakes out as you throw it, allowing the weapon to wrap around a group of enemies. You use the bolas to attempt a ranged [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) against all creatures in a 5-foot radius burst within the weapon's first range increment. Roll a separate [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check for each target. Each attempt counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but don't increase your penalty until you have made all the attempts.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
